title: install fiefox addons for all users in ubuntu
content:
I configure all my clients in office with ansible. But I can not find any commands to install system-wide addon or install addon for every user so I first try to follow these pages

https://wiki.mozilla.org/Extension_Manager:Multiple_Item_Packages

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37728865/install-webextensions-on-firefox-from-the-command-line

I download a addon file (xxx.xpi) and extract the file, but there's no install.rdf file now. so I can't get the em:id to do the next step.

and then I find out that articles was poublished almost 8 yrs ago.

is there any official solution to install system-wide exntsions nowdays ?
creator: changch

title: la rotellina del mouse apre nuova scheda quando passa sopra un link
content:
la rotellina la utilizzo per scorrere in alto e in basso la pagina internet Quando la rotellina del mouse passa sopra un link apre nuova scheda probabilmente shiaccio e faccio clic con la rotellina senza rendermene conto

vorrei disattivare la funzione "apri link in una nuova scheda" al passaggio del cursore mediante rotellina e vorrei disattivare la funzione "apri link in una nuova scheda" al clic mediante rotellina
creator: giovanni.tessitore

title: I get a blank page when I try to go to the following site I've been using with Firefox for years: https://www.aircanada.com/ca/en/aco/home.html
content:
I get a blank page when I try to go to the following site I've been using with Firefox for years: https://www.aircanada.com/ca/en/aco/home.html

My default browser is Firefox (now as always). My Firefox says it is up to date. This happened for the first time when I tried to go to that page yesterday. I've tried many times yesterday and today. I get a blank for ALL of the Air Canada pages I've tried. However, I can access all of those pages using Chrome.

My email address is [removed email from public]
creator: alice.nakamura

title: Firefox Color Addon
content: I seems to have lost my colors which I setup with Firefox color. How do I recover this ?
creator: dtang30

title: Firefox "Print Preview" has disappeared from the File menu - Again (vers 97.0.1)
content:
Not exactly sure when this started, but I recently updated to FF 97.0.1.

I previously made the about:config changes about a year ago when this happened. "Double-click the print.tab_modal.enabled preference to switch between the new experience (true) and the classic experience (false)".

But it's not working now. I even toggled back & forth (false - true - false) but to no avail.

How do I get the Print Preview option showing up in the drop down File menu like it used to be?
creator: Mike109

title: Gmail emails are all blank
content:
All my Gmail emails are blank all of a sudden. No text body. And NO PROBLEM on Chrome. Please help.

(And clearing the cache have never helped any issue, just wiping my logins)
creator: dc2257

title: Using Firefox with duckduckgo
content:
I use duckduckgo everywhere as my home page.

I recently started using Firefox at home on my own computers. At work, my duckduckgo home page shows a few of my most frequently visited websites (I think I'm on Chrome at work, but Edge does the same thing)

At home, on Firefox, I do not get these frequently visited websites, (but I do on Chrome and Edge) 

I don't know if this is a Firefox issue or a duckduckgo issue, but I would appreciate some help sorting it out. I didn't realize how much I relied on those frequent links ... until they weren't there.

Thanks
creator: ericsdunn5

title: Unable to logon to bank website
content: Since the Presidents' Day weekend I have been unable to logon to the Fifth Third Bank website from my computer. Several calls to the bank's customer service confirm that many patrons are having the same problem. Today's call elicited that their tech support is still having problems with Firefox, Safari, and other browsers. The website is https://www.53.com and the customer service telephone number is 1-(800) 972-3030. Can the tech people at Firefox/Mozilla find a solution to this problem? Please help. Many customers are in the same boat.
creator: ralph.morgan.lewis.2010
